DOC.brief_summary: The study aim develop test feasibility pediatric physical activity intervention incorporate personal information use build environment , test intervention 's preliminary efficacy increase physical activity . The investigator hypothesize feasible incorporate measure change empiric GIS ( geographic information system ) , GPS ( global positioning system ) , accelerometer feedback office setting demonstrate : ) Completeness GPS accelerometer data collection ( primary measure feasibility ) , ii ) Participation rate among adolescent intervention group compare control group , iii ) Acceptability patient measure adolescent satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: Children 's Use Built Environment Physical Activity
DOC.criteria: Adolescents age 1016 year BMI > 85th percentile age sex Physical condition impair ambulation Adolescents speak English Adolescents miss 2 schedule doctor 's appointment past 5 year Adolescents receive form physical activity counseling/intervention time enrollment
